availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph Fenwyck and Sarah Fenwyck. Married to Evaline B. Fenwyck. Father of Emily B. Fenwyck. Resident in Bath County in 1850. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Farmer in Bath County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, District 1, p. 63B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 162.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Bath County, KY, October 1863, p. 132 of 212 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
